item.description:
In this Meetup we will discuss areas of interest which attendees wish to explore in the coming year.   After that, details about each monthly topic will be added a month before the Meetup date. Please attend and make suggestions for future topics.

The quickest way to contact the group organizer is by sending an e-mail to info@ulcsclinic.com.  Please enter "Meetup Member" in subj. line.

Why are people focusing on Back-to-Basics Self-Sufficiency Skills at this time?

Extremely challenging times may soon be upon us, due to several situations which have reached a critical threshold.

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A (Resources & Monetary Systems)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Open Discussion of Topics to be Explored in 2013
